perturbation.original_text: 3.2.3 You shall, at our option, execute our then-current form of Master Franchise Agreement and any addenda thereto for the renewal term, which renewal agreement shall supersede this Agreement in all respects, and the terms of which, including, without limitation, continuing fees payable to us, may differ materially and be less advantageous to you than the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.2.3 You shall, at our option, execute our then-current form of Master Franchise Agreement and any addenda thereto for the renewal term, which renewal agreement shall supersede this Agreement in all respects, and the terms of which, including, without limitation, continuing fees payable to us, will be substantially similar and equally advantageous to you as the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Section 3.2.3 is contradictory because it implies that the terms of the renewal agreement 'may differ materially and be less advantageous.' However, the modified version states that the renewal agreement will be 'substantially similar and equally advantageous.' This contradiction introduces uncertainty about the renewal terms.

perturbation.original_text:
10.6 Termination of This Agreement by You
You shall have no right to terminate this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
10.6 Termination of This Agreement by You
You shall have the right to terminate this Agreement by providing a written notice within ten (10) days.
perturbation.explanation: Section 10.6 is contradictory because it states that 'You shall have no right to terminate this Agreement'. However, the modified version states that 'You shall have the right to terminate this Agreement by providing a written notice within ten (10) days.' This contradiction introduces uncertainty about the terms of termination.

perturbation.original_text:
16.3 Survival of Obligations After Expiration or Termination of Agreement
Any provision or covenant of this Agreement which expressly or by its nature imposes obligations beyond the expiration or termination of this Agreement shall survive such expiration or termination.
perturbation.changed_text:
16.3 Survival of Obligations After Expiration or Termination of Agreement
No provision or covenant of this Agreement which expressly or by its nature imposes obligations beyond the expiration or termination of this Agreement shall survive such expiration or termination.
perturbation.explanation: Section 16.3 is contradictory because it states that 'Any provision or covenant of this Agreement which expressly or by its nature imposes obligations beyond the expiration or termination of this Agreement shall survive such expiration or termination.'. However, the modified version states that 'No provision or covenant of this Agreement which expressly or by its nature imposes obligations beyond the expiration or termination of this Agreement shall survive such expiration or termination.' This contradiction introduces uncertainty about the terms of termination.
